title: about
text:
Welcome to the EMC Programming cCaf√©!
We are a (self-organised) group of bio-medical researchers based at Erasmus Medical Center (Rotterdam, NL), who try to support each other with all sort of ‚Äúcoding matters‚Äù. We talk about programming, scripting, software configs, visualization, stats and opens science challenges in general.
We meet (usually bi-monthly) to share knowledge, ‚Äúpair program‚Äù, review each others code and, sometimes, just to have a chat.
We are part of a larger network of programming cafes (chek it out!)

‚òïÔ∏è Join us!
Everybody (all experiece levels and research interests) is welcome to join us!
Shoot us an email.


ü´±üèΩ‚Äçü´≤üèª Code of Conduct
Participants are expected to follow these guidelines:

Use welcoming and inclusive language.
Be respectful of different viewpoints and experiences.
Gracefully accept constructive criticism.
Focus on what is best for the community.
Show courtesy and respect towards other community members.



üíÉüèªüï∫üèΩ contact list: who are we, what do we want
In this document we try to keep track of the people involved, their expertese and which things we would like to learn.
